events.message: I received the wrong product and would like to request a refund because this item does not meet my expectations at all.
The reported issue has been classified as a refund request due to the customer's dissatisfaction with the product received.
Assigning the case to agent Sarah M., who handles refund requests and customer returns for incorrect orders.
Hello, I’m Sarah from customer support. I am sorry to hear about the issue with your order, and I’m here to help you get this sorted out.
Could you please provide the order number and a photo of the product you received so we can verify and proceed with the refund?
Here is my order number 784512 and attached photos show that the product is completely different from what I ordered.
Thank you for the details. We will begin processing your refund immediately and you will receive a confirmation email within 48 hours.
Thank you for the quick response. I appreciate the prompt action and look forward to the confirmation email shortly.
Your refund has been processed successfully, and the amount should appear on your original payment method within 5 to 7 business days.
Just following up to ensure you have received your refund and if there is anything else we can assist you with.
The case has been closed after confirming the refund completion. Thank you for your patience and understanding.
